BoardGame:BGAnger.NAME: Anger
BoardGame:BGAnger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put this card on top of your draw pile.

BoardGame:BGApotheosis.NAME: Apotheosis
BoardGame:BGApotheosis.DESCRIPTION: Your starter Strikes deal +1 damage. NL NL Your starter Defends gain +1 Block.

BoardGame:BGBerserk.NAME: Berserk
BoardGame:BGBerserk.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, NL deal !M! damage to any row.

BoardGame:BGBlood for Blood.NAME: Blood for Blood
BoardGame:BGBlood for Blood.DESCRIPTION: Costs !M! [R] NL if you lost HP this combat. NL Deal !D! damage.

BoardGame:BGBurn.NAME: Burn
BoardGame:BGBurn.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take 1 damage.
BoardGame:BGBurn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.

BoardGame:BGChoke.NAME: Choke
BoardGame:BGChoke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each boardgame:Weak and boardgame:Poison on the target.

BoardGame:BGCombust.NAME: Combust
BoardGame:BGCombust.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, deal !M! damage to any row.

BoardGame:BGDarkShackles.NAME: Dark Shackles
BoardGame:BGDarkShackles.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each enemy that intends to attack you. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGDecay.NAME: Decay
BoardGame:BGDecay.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, take 1 damage.

BoardGame:BGDoppelganger.NAME: Doppelganger
BoardGame:BGDoppelganger.DESCRIPTION: Copy the last Attack or Skill anyone played this turn with cost equal to X. NL Exhaust.
BoardGame:BGDoppelganger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy the last Attack or Skill anyone played this turn with cost equal to X.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No copyable cards have been played this turn.
I can't play this for less than

BoardGame:BGDouble Tap.NAME: Double Tap
BoardGame:BGDouble Tap.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Attack is played twice. NL Can't be played if Double Tap is already active.

BoardGame:BGDramatic Entrance.NAME: Dramatic Entrance
BoardGame:BGDramatic Entrance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to any row. NL Deals !M! additional damage if it's the first turn of combat.

BoardGame:BGFakeShiv.NAME: Shiv
BoardGame:BGFakeShiv.DESCRIPTION: For debug purposes only. NL In the Board Game, Shivs are tokens, not cards.
BoardGame:BGFakeShiv.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For debug purposes only. NL You can't upgrade Shivs in the Board Game.

BoardGame:BGFeed.NAME: Feed
BoardGame:BGFeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, gain !M! Strength. Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGFinesse.NAME: Finesse
BoardGame:BGFinesse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGFlame Barrier.NAME: Flame Barrier
BoardGame:BGFlame Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !M! Thorns damage to all enemies that intend to attack you.

BoardGame:BGFlash of Steel.NAME: Flash of Steel
BoardGame:BGFlash of Steel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGFlex.NAME: Flex
BoardGame:BGFlex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.
BoardGame:BGFlex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

BoardGame:BGGhostly.NAME: Apparition
BoardGame:BGGhostly.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You can't lose more than 1 HP this turn. NL Exhaust.
BoardGame:BGGhostly.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You can't lose more than 1 HP this turn. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGGhostly Armor.NAME: Ghostly Armor
BoardGame:BGGhostly Armor.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL !B! Block to any player.

BoardGame:BGHandOfGreed.NAME: Hand of Greed
BoardGame:BGHandOfGreed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage if you have 10 or more Gold.

BoardGame:BGHavoc.NAME: Havoc
BoardGame:BGHavoc.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, play it for 0 Energy, and Exhaust it.

BoardGame:BGImmolate.NAME: Immolate
BoardGame:BGImmolate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to any row. NL Put 2 *Dazed on top of your draw pile.

BoardGame:BGInfinite Blades.NAME: Infinite Blades
BoardGame:BGInfinite Blades.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! boardgame:Shiv.
BoardGame:BGInfinite Blades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! boardgame:Shivs.

BoardGame:BGIron Wave.NAME: Iron Wave
BoardGame:BGIron Wave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: boardgame:Naive. NL 2 damage, 1 Block NL - or -  NL 1 damage, 2 Block.

BoardGame:BGJuggernaut.NAME: Juggernaut
BoardGame:BGJuggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, deal !M! damage.

BoardGame:BGMadness.NAME: Madness
BoardGame:BGMadness.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play this turn costs 0. NL Exhaust.
BoardGame:BGMadness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL The next card you play this turn costs 0. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGMasterful Stab.NAME: Masterful Stab
BoardGame:BGMasterful Stab.DESCRIPTION: Costs [G] [G] NL if you lost HP this combat. NL Deal !D! damage.

BoardGame:BGMayhem.NAME: Mayhem
BoardGame:BGMayhem.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, draw a card and play it for 0 Energy.

BoardGame:BGMind Blast.NAME: Mind Blast
BoardGame:BGMind Blast.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand.
BoardGame:BGMind Blast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand +1.

BoardGame:BGNoxiousFumes.NAME: Noxious Fumes
BoardGame:BGNoxiousFumes.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 1 boardgame:Poison.
BoardGame:BGNoxiousFumes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 1 boardgame:Poison to any row.

BoardGame:BGOffering.NAME: Offering
BoardGame:BGOffering.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP. NL Gain [R] [R]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
BoardGame:BGOffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP. NL Gain [R] [R]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGPanacea.NAME: Panacea
BoardGame:BGPanacea.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove all boardgame:Weak and boardgame:Vulnerable from any player. NL Exhaust.
BoardGame:BGPanacea.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove all boardgame:Weak and boardgame:Vulnerable from ALL players. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGPain.NAME: Pain
BoardGame:BGPain.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If 2 or fewer cards are in your hand at the end of your turn, lose 1 HP.

BoardGame:BGPanache.NAME: Panache
BoardGame:BGPanache.DESCRIPTION: Each time your hand is empty at the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to any row.

BoardGame:BGParasite.NAME: Parasite
BoardGame:BGParasite.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If removed from your deck, lose 2 HP.

BoardGame:BGPerfected Strike.NAME: Perfected Strike
BoardGame:BGPerfected Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each other card in your hand containing "Strike".
BoardGame:BGPerfected Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each other card in your hand containing "Strike".

BoardGame:BGPower Through.NAME: Power Through
BoardGame:BGPower Through.DESCRIPTION: !B! Block to any player. NL Put a *Dazed on top of your draw pile.

BoardGame:BGPredator.NAME: Predator
BoardGame:BGPredator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Any player draws !M! cards.

BoardGame:BGRage.NAME: Rage
BoardGame:BGRage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Attack in your hand.

BoardGame:BGRampage.NAME: Rampage
BoardGame:BGRampage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your Exhaust pile.
BoardGame:BGRampage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your Exhaust pile.

BoardGame:BGSentinel.NAME: Sentinel
BoardGame:BGSentinel.DESCRIPTION: !B! Block to any player. NL If this card is Exhausted, NL gain [R] [R].
BoardGame:BGSentinel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: !B! Block to any player. NL If this card is Exhausted, NL gain [R] [R] [R].

BoardGame:BGSever Soul.NAME: Sever Soul
BoardGame:BGSever Soul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card.
BoardGame:BGSever Soul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust 1 or 2 cards.

BoardGame:BGShame.NAME: Shame
BoardGame:BGShame.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Block.

BoardGame:BGShockwave.NAME: Shockwave
BoardGame:BGShockwave.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 boardgame:Vulnerable and boardgame:Weak to any row. NL Exhaust.
BoardGame:BGShockwave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 boardgame:Vulnerable and !M! boardgame:Weak to any row. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGSneckoEyeGainDazed.NAME: Recklessness
BoardGame:BGSneckoEyeGainDazed.DESCRIPTION: Put a *Dazed on top of your draw pile.

BoardGame:BGSpot Weakness.NAME: Spot Weakness
BoardGame:BGSpot Weakness.DESCRIPTION: If the die is on 1, 2, or 3, gain !M! Strength.
BoardGame:BGSpot Weakness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the die is on 1, 2, 3, or 4, gain !M! Strength.

BoardGame:BGThe Bomb.NAME: The Bomb
BoardGame:BGThe Bomb.DESCRIPTION: At the end of 3 turns, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies, then Exhaust this card.

BoardGame:BGThinking Ahead.NAME: Thinking Ahead
BoardGame:BGThinking Ahead.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGTrue Grit.NAME: True Grit
BoardGame:BGTrue Grit.DESCRIPTION: !B! Block to any player. NL Exhaust 1 card.
BoardGame:BGTrue Grit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: !B! Block to any player. NL Exhaust 1 card.

BoardGame:BGTwin Strike.NAME: Twin Strike
BoardGame:BGTwin Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: boardgame:Naive. NL Deal 2 damage then 1 damage.

BoardGame:BGUppercut.NAME: Uppercut
BoardGame:BGUppercut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! boardgame:Vulnerable. NL Apply 1 boardgame:Weak.
BoardGame:BGUppercut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! boardgame:Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! boardgame:Weak.

BoardGame:BGVoidCard.NAME: Void
BoardGame:BGVoidCard.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL This card automatically plays when drawn.

BoardGame:BGWarcry.NAME: Warcry
BoardGame:BGWarcry.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
BoardGame:BGWarcry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BoardGame:BGWhirlwind.NAME: Whirlwind
BoardGame:BGWhirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times to any row.
BoardGame:BGWhirlwind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times to any row.

BoardGame:BGWild Strike.NAME: Wild Strike
BoardGame:BGWild Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a *Dazed on top of your draw pile.

BoardGame:BGXCostChoice.NAME: X Cost Choice
BoardGame:BGXCostChoice.DESCRIPTION: For debug purposes only. NL In the Board Game, you can choose how much Energy to spend on X Cost cards.
